main event: A witness observed a basketball-shaped red and yellow object moving toward the western sky for approximately 8 minutes.
interesting points: The object was compared to a blimp by the observer.,The observer reported the object was all lit up with red and yellow glowing lights.,The object was observed during the night and made no sound.,The sighting lasted for a total of 8 minutes before the object disappeared heading upward.,The witness indicated they were driving at the time of the sighting and had to stop the car to observe it.
witness description: The witness is a housewife, age 48, who had a questionable history of similar sightings.
